scripts.deploy-main: node scripts/deploy-prep.js mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ wswarren12/lex-dao-multi-summoner-moloch
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: node scripts/deploy-prep.js rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ lex-dao-multi-summoner-moloch-rinkeby
